transcript: you think about money as a stored unit of time you give time and then you get money all of us are getting the same time per day and so if you master your time you'll be able to master money it's more around making decisions that yield the most per unit of time or effort what you do who you do it with where you do it big big decisions where you live if you're smart about it can be a lowrisk high return decision like make the easy good decisions and then that'll help you make the hard good decisions
